Parameters: Rect: The content rectangle. Must fit in the page.
setContentRect(android.graphics.Rect).Description: Sets the content rectangle in PostScript point (1/72th of an inch). This is the area that contains the page content and is relative to the page top left.

Parameters: int: The page width in PostScript (1/72th of an inch).
int: The page height in PostScript (1/72th of an inch).
PdfDocument.PageInfo.Builder(int,int,int.Description: Creates a new builder with the mandatory page info attributes.
PdfDocument.PageInfo.Builder(int,int,int.FullName: public PdfDocument.PageInfo.Builder (int pageWidth, int pageHeight, int pageNumber)
